description: Tucker is at the park with his dog enjoying the day which he does every week. He needs to let the stress of the day go and this is the best place to unwind. Luke always comes to the same park and he sees Tucker at the same bench time and time again. This time Luke has the balls to stop and chat with him for a bit and feel out the vibe. The conversation goes very well so Luke asks him out on a date and Tucker agrees. They head out for ice cream and spend the whole day out in the city and by the time they get back to Luke's house its dark and they have their first kiss right at the door. After the hot kiss they go inside and Luke fucks Tucker intimately and passionately. The connection between the two is fierce and you can see it in the movement of their bodies as they pump and grind each other pleasing every aspect of the male body. The sexual intimacy builds up until they both leave their hot loads on Luke's chest.
title: Let Me In
